posts.post_content:
Offered for sale, one of the very tough Hindu T205's, Pfeister, Chicago Cubs.

$2,500 delivered. Very tough in any grade, most of the ones in existence are lower grade than this. Prefer check or money order, but paypal is ok

This T205 is as rare OR rarer than any of the Red T206 Hindu's that sold in SCP, get one while you can!
